data.title: European and International Cooperation
meta_keywords: Department of European and International Cooperation
data.text:
Please note that due to the wide range of publications, events and news, there is a temporal pre-filtering. This means that the search covers the following time periods for these content types:

For events, the search results are pre-filtered according to the date of the event from today until one year into the future.

For publications, the search results are pre-filtered according to the publication date from today until two years in the past.

For news, search results are pre-filtered by the publication date from today until one year in the past.

Using the "Period" filter, you can extend or reduce the search time accordingly at any time.

Your search term is used to search the contents of the entire website - this includes all pages at kas.de as well as all pages of the numerous independent microsites of the Political Education Forums, foreign offices and other microsites. If you are interested, you can also limit your search to one of these microsites using the special filter "target website".

If the PDFs are available in a readable format, they will also be searched for your search term and offered to you as a document in the search results.

Please do not use more than five search terms at a time. To increase the performance of the search function, the maximum number of search terms has been limited to five terms.

Search syntax
